ModMetaData.name: VGP_CoffeeTeaDrugs
ModMetaData.author: dismar
ModMetaData.description:
Coffee and Tea will be added into the drug policies. But have no addiction. And teetotaler will not drink them.
Does not require a new save. But you will have to create a new drug Policy in game for them to show up.
Can be loaded any when on your mod list.
